placeHolders.waiting-for-others: Waiting for all players to click ready ...
placeHolders.declaration-empty: Your declaration under condition ${0} is empty
placeHolders.declaration-above-max: Your declaration under condition ${0} is above the limit (${1})
placeHolders.declaration-warning-description: Something seems odd with your declaration. Do you want to submit it anyway? It will not be possible to change it at a later time.
placeHolders.declaration-submit-description: Do you want to proceed and submit your declaration? It will not be possible to change it at a later time.
placeHolders.noProject-declaration-low-warning: Your declaration under condition No Project is lower than the known minimum. Do you want to submit it anyway? It will not be possible to change it at a later time.
placeHolders.noProject-declaration-high-warning: Your declaration under condition No Project is greater than the known maximum value. Do you want to submit it anyway? It will not be possible to change it at a later time.
placeHolders.projectA-declaration-low-warning: Your declaration under condition Project is lower than the known minimum. Do you want to submit it anyway? It will not be possible to change it at a later time.
placeHolders.projectA-declaration-high-warning: Your declaration under condition Project is greater than the known maximum value. Do you want to submit it anyway? It will not be possible to change it at a later time.
placeHolders.private-signal-tooltip: This value represents 1% of the true sum of values of all properties under condition ${0} plus or minus an error term. This is an estimate of the payout per share if everyone declares their true value after the market phase.
placeHolders.public-signal-tooltip: This value represents 1% of the sum of initial declarations under condition ${0} for all properties.  This is the payout per share if everyone declares the same amount after the market phase as they declared before the market phase.
placeHolders.median-tooltip: This is the median value of the 7 most recent transactions under condition ${0}
placeHolders.reward-earned: Round ${0} has been selected for payment. You earned ${1} points in that round. The exchange rate is ${2}. You have earned € ${3}
placeHolders.could-not-find-bids: No bids from other players are available. Your own are not considered for trade: they are marked with a star
placeHolders.could-not-find-asks: No bids from other players are available. Your own are not considered for trade: they are marked with a star
placeHolders.order-price-missing: You did not specify the price of your offer
placeHolders.order-price-negative: Order prices must be non negative. Your price: ${0}
placeHolders.no-shares-available: You have already committed all your shares ${0} in other asks. You can cancel them if you want to publish new ones
placeHolders.no-balance-available: You have already committed much of your balance (${0}) in other bids, The remainder (${1}) is not enough to bid ${2}. You may cancel previous bids to free some of your balance.
